title: Agile and DevSecOps
description: This course covers agile methodologies and DevSecOps practices for modern software development. Topics include user stories, sprint planning, continuous integration, and security in the development pipeline.

title: Cloud Computing
description: This course explores cloud computing concepts, architectures, and technologies. Students will learn about IaaS, PaaS, SaaS, containerization, and cloud security practices.

title: AI and Machine Learning
description: This course introduces artificial intelligence and machine learning concepts and applications. Topics include supervised and unsupervised learning, neural networks, and natural language processing.
